org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text

Class LowLevelTextObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text.LowLevelTextObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeContainer, ContentObject, TextContent, TextContentVariants, TextObject, GeometricObject, org.primaresearch.ident.Identifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Glyph, TextLine, Word

    public abstract class LowLevelTextObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextObject, ContentObject
    Abstract class representing low level text objects such as text line, word and glyph.
    Author:
    clc

      • reomveTextContentVariant

        public void reomveTextContentVariant(int index)
        Description copied from interface: TextContentVariants
        Removes the text content variant at the given index, if there are two or more variants. One text content variant has to exist at all times.
        Specified by:
        reomveTextContentVariant in interface TextContentVariants
